Authors: Rahmandita A., Fajar A.N., Shofi I.M., Girsang A.S.
Title: Analysis and Design of XYZ Integrated System Based on Service Oriented Architecture
Source title: Proceeding - 2018 International Conference on ICT for Smart Society: Innovation Toward Smart Society and Society 5.0, ICISS 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Informatics Engineering Department, Universitas Islam Negeri Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta, Indonesia; Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Rahmandita, A., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Shofi, I.M., Informatics Engineering Department, Universitas Islam Negeri Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta, Indonesia; Girsang, A.S., Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The purpose of this research is to identify the needs of information services, business processes, utilization of information and communication technology and to integrate The Cone-X-ion system in XYZ company. The method used is Service Oriented Architecture Delivery Lifecycle based on Service Modeling Framework in Service Orientation Analysis. The results of this research is an integrated system between departments of XYZ company scope (The Cone-X-ion). The existence of The Cone-X-ion system facilitates corporate transactions and reduces the amount of paper use in daily activities (paperless). © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Service Modeling; Service Oriented Analysis and Design; Service Oriented Architecture (SOA)
Index Keywords: Architecture; Information services; Integrated control; Ions; Business Process; Daily activity; Information and Communication Technologies; Integrated systems; Ion systems; Service Model; Service orientation; Service Oriented; Service oriented architecture (SOA)
